config.label: Rel
config.name: rel
config.helpText: If filled, it will only show the filters belonging to the selected context.

config.label: Ignored Params(separated with ,)

config.label: No Reload

config.helpText: If activated, removing a filter by clicking on the X will not reload the page and those components that depend on it will be reloaded.
